awd_titl_txt: Apparatus for In Situ Measurements of the Physical          Properties of Disordered Magnetic Thin Films
awd_abstract_narration: A unique experimental apparatus will be constructed, capable of                 preparing, by vapor deposition, thin-film alloys from 4K up to                  1100K and permitting measurement of thermodynamic and transport                 properties of these samples in situ from 1k to 1100K.                                                                                                                                       %%%                                                                                                                                 Many of the more interesting magnetic-alloy materials are both                  highly reactive in air and, too, only available in thin-film form.              With the proposed apparatus, it will become possible to measure                 thermal properties of such materials and furnish a test of current              theory.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
